Package edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.util

Provides a set of classes that are useful by implementations of the Linguist interface.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GDLDumper
    A linguist processor that dumps out the sentence hmm in GDL format.
    LinguistDumper
    A linguist processor that dumps out the search space in a simple format.
    LinguistStats
    A linguist processor that dumps out statistics about the search space
    LinguistTimer
    Gets successors from a linguist and times them
    LRUCache<K,V>
    An LRU cache

Package edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.util Description

Provides a set of classes that are useful by implementations of the Linguist interface. These utility classes are typically used to test and debug a linguist.
